subHeader: Leading AI-assisted engineering initiatives, prompt standards, and behavioral reliability efforts across Dekaflow and internal tooling.
role: Senior Full Stack Engineer — AI Systems Integration
highlights: Led company-wide GitHub Copilot integration, defining prompting standards, guardrails, and safe-usage guidelines adopted by 100+ engineers.
Taught prompt engineering workshops covering reproducibility, failure modes, structured prompting, and model behavior constraints.
Designed behavioral evaluation methods and dashboards to measure reliability, drift, and regression in AI-assisted coding flows.
Built system-level prompts and structured meta-prompts used across internal tools, reducing hallucinations and improving determinism.
Performed behavioral incident triage, diagnosing drift or misalignment and implementing validated prompt-level mitigations.
Championed transparent, accessible, and safety-conscious UX in AI-integrated interfaces.

subHeader: Co-founded and led engineering for a social platform designed around meaningful human connection and safe interaction patterns.
highlights: Built a cross-platform mobile app with real-time chat, scheduling, and geolocation, applying behavior-aware UI design to ensure predictability.
Developed a prompt-driven moderation helper to classify and flag content safely within Supabase constraints.
Created a React web companion dashboard and Supabase backend with strict validation and user-safety principles.
Ensured accessibility and consistent performance across iOS, Android, and web.
Managed App Store and Play Store deployments with user trust and clarity at the forefront.

subHeader: Engineering lead for AI-assisted marketing, analytics, and content-management platforms.
role: Senior Full Stack Developer — LLM-Integrated Systems
highlights: Built AI-assisted dashboards and workflow tools using React and Python, including summarization and classification modules.
Authored structural meta-prompts tuned for reliability and constrained behavior across high-variability inputs.
Designed and executed prompt experiments and A/B tests to measure drift, safety edge cases, and sensitivity.
Built ingestion pipelines (Redis + Postgres) feeding LLMs with validated, safety-checked data sources.
Created internal prompting standards and documentation guiding safe prompting practices across teams.
Partnered with leadership to translate ethical requirements into prompt-layer guardrails and behavioral constraints.
Led ADA compliance audits, ensuring accessible, human-centered interfaces across all platforms.

subHeader: Short-term contract improving accessibility, modernization, and long-term maintainability.
highlights: Conducted a full ADA/WCAG audit, resolving key accessibility issues across the main public site.
Migrated the organization to a maintainable Wix-based platform to empower non-technical teams.
Improved UX structures for clarity and broad accessibility.
Trained internal staff on accessibility-minded content workflows.

subHeader: Developed ML-enhanced IoT interfaces that translated complex diagnostics into clear, actionable user experiences.
role: Full Stack Engineer — ML-Enhanced IoT Systems
highlights: Developed real-time IoT dashboards using React, WebSockets, and Python for high-throughput telemetry.
Integrated traditional ML anomaly detection into backend services for early-risk identification.
Built evaluation pipelines measuring accuracy, drift, and false-positive rates.
Translated ML outputs into interpretable insights for high-speed technician environments.
Optimized performance across iOS and Android via React Native.

subHeader: Improved web systems and workflows supporting marketing, operational consistency, and reliability.
highlights: Modernized front-end templates, reducing inconsistency across marketing channels.
Identified workflow risks and implemented mitigations to strengthen operational reliability.
Enhanced mobile UX and accessibility through responsive UI improvements.
Consolidated more than 10+ scattered email templates into a unified, maintainable master template.

subHeader: Delivered front-end experiences across web, social, and early AR interfaces.
highlights: Built responsive interfaces for interactive media and client platforms in fast-turnaround cycles.
Developed UI components for early augmented-reality glasses prototypes.
Explored foundational ML and computer-vision concepts supporting AR interaction — the spark for later AI behavior work.
Adapted rapidly to shifting stacks (React, Liquid, PHP), delivering consistent results under tight deadlines.

subHeader: Designed and built accessible, human-centered websites for authors, nonprofits, and small businesses.
highlights: Built responsive, accessible websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and WordPress.
Created interactive tools such as property listings and donor-engagement features.
Delivered UX-focused designs tailored to each client’s goals.
Maintained long-term relationships with iterative enhancement and support.
Ensured performance, cross-device compatibility, and accessibility across all projects.
